definition: higher education record/record including Master's or Doctoral degree

sentences.english: Rise to the top wage through on-the-job experience or by earning an advanced degree.
sentences.chinese: 高工資的獲得需要工作經驗和高學歷。

sentences.english: In some states you can even become a substitute teacher even if you only have a limited amount of credits.
sentences.chinese: 在一些國家即使你沒有高學歷，也可以成爲代課老師。

sentences.english: When we look at college-degreed women, they were less likely to report same-sex activity than other educational groups.
sentences.chinese: 其實大學女生同性戀現象比其他學歷女生要少。

sentences.english: You will find enclosed an outline of my education and copies of three letters of recommendation.
sentences.chinese: 隨函寄上本人學歷的簡要概況及三封推薦信。

sentences.english: Among men, there’s more same-sex activity among higher-educated men.
sentences.chinese: 在男性當中，學歷越高則同性戀越多。

sentences.english: Senior middle school or same level, with Engineering or Mechanic and background.
sentences.chinese: 高中及以上學歷，工程或機械類相關專業。

sentences.english: You will find Enclosed an outline of my education and business training and copies of two letters of recommendation.
sentences.chinese: 有關本人學歷，業務培訓的概要連同兩封信一同呈上。

sentences.english: Master level or above with at least 2 years of direct patient care experience.
sentences.chinese: 碩士或以上學歷，至少有2年直接管理病人的經驗。

sentences.english: He outed Tang Jun, former president of Microsoft China, for making false claims about his academic qualifications.
sentences.chinese: 他揭露了微軟中國前主席唐駿的學歷造假事情。

sentences.english: You are not absorbing to Bachelor or Master degree?
sentences.chinese: 你在複習大本技歷還得碩士學歷？

sentences.english: In addition, we also examine whether there is any substitutive or complementary relation between diploma and certifications ?
sentences.chinese: 而學歷與證照上是否存在替代或互補的關係？

sentences.english: Nowadays, educational qualifications and professional competence credentials are the stepping-stone(passport) to get a good job .
sentences.chinese: 現如今學歷和專業技能證書是找到好工作的敲門磚。

sentences.english: Job Requirements1, Minimum 2 years sales experience in Luxury or high-end fashion retail industry.
sentences.chinese: 至少二年以上奢華高級時裝銷售經驗，高中以上學歷。

sentences.english: Technical secondary school or relative degree in chemical engineering or equipment.
sentences.chinese: 具有化工或設備專業中專或技校相關學歷。

sentences.english: These universities online offer financial aid and accredited degrees as well.
sentences.chinese: 這些在線大學同樣提供助學金和公認的學歷。

sentences.english: At present, all kinds of education students total size of more than 2000 people.
sentences.chinese: 目前，各類學歷教育在校生總規模2000餘人。

definition: specialty/specialized field/main field of study (at university)/major/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]/professional
the Great Learning, one of the Four Books 四書|四书[Si4 shu1] in Confucianism
master's degree/person who has a master's degree/learned person
higher education record/record including Master's or Doctoral degree
to accept an applicant (prospective student, employee etc) who passes an entrance exam/to admit (a student)/to hire (a job candidate)
